title: Two charged spheres hanging from string

content.question: Let y = 0 be the vertical position of the uncharged spheres, with positive y toward the top of the page. Which of the following correctly ranks the new vertical positions yA and yB of spheres A and B, respectively, in the new equilibrium configuration?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
